trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: To wam zmóžnja, fotografować a fota nahrać.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you unlock the app.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Websydła, kotrež wopytujeće, snano waše stejnišćo žadaja.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: To wam zmóžnja, wideja natočić a nahrać.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Microphone Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: To wam zmóžnja, fota składować a nahrać.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
This is the menu item that appears when you long press the Focus icon on the phone home screen.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.
trans-unit.target: Zhašejće swoju posedźensku historiju, swoje hesła a placki kóždy čas z jednym podótkom.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'History' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the third panel 'History' in the First Run tour.
Button to go to the next card in Focus onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose a different search engine.
trans-unit.target: Pytaće za něčim druhim? Wubjerće druhu pytawu.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Waše pytanje kaž wy jo chceće
trans-unit.note: Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.
Button to skip onboarding in Focus

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
trans-unit.target: Zběhńće priwatne přehladowanje na přichodnu wyšu runinu. Blokujće wabjenje a hinaši wobsah, kotryž móžeće přez sydła slědować a začitanske časy stronow podlěšić.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.
Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: %@ so wot Mozilla zhotowja. Naša misija je hladanje stroweho, wotewrjeneho interneta.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.target: Pytajće a přehladujće direktnje w nałoženju
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
trans-unit.target: Blokujće přesćěhowaki (abo aktualizujće nastajenja, zo byšće přesćěhowaki dowolił)
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: Zhašejće placki a pytansku přehladowansku historiju
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a private browser:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block web fonts to reduce page size

trans-unit.target: Wužiwajće jón jako rozšěrjenje za Safari:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

%@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Title displayed in the settings screen that, when tapped, takes the user to a page with information about the product. Also displayed as a header for the About page.
Label on About screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Button to dismiss the 'Add Pass Failed' alert.

trans-unit.source: An error occured while adding the pass to Wallet. Please try again later.

Title of the 'Add Pass Failed' alert.
%@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Prompt shown to ask the user to use Touch ID, Face ID, or passcode to continue browsing after returning to the app.

trans-unit.note: Description for enabling or disabling the default list. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
label describing URL Autocomplete as disabled

label describing URL Autocomplete as enabled

trans-unit.source: The Internet connection appears to be offline.

Button text for retrying network connection
Text for a label that indicates the title of button from onboarding screen version 2.
Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for the onboarding screen version 2.
Text for a label that indicates the title of button from onboarding screen
Text for a label that indicates the title of the bottom button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: We clear your history when you close the app for extra privacy.
trans-unit.target: Zhašamy wašu historiju, hdyž nałoženje za přidatnu priwatnosć začinjeće.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the first subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Make %@ your default to protect your data with every link you open.
trans-unit.target: Čińće %@ k swojemu standardnemu wobhladowakej, zo byšće swoje daty z kóždym wotkazom, kotryž wočinjeće, škitał.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the second subtitle for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title for the default browser onboarding screen version 2. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title of the top button from the default browser onboarding screen version 2.

trans-unit.source: Erase your browsing history, passwords, cookies, and prevent unwanted ads from following you in a simple click!
trans-unit.target: Zhašejće swoju přehladowansku historiju, hesła, placki, a zadźěwajće z jednym kliknjenjom tomu, zo wam njewitane wabjenje slěduje!
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of history section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: %@ is a dedicated privacy browser with tracking protection and content blocking.
trans-unit.target: %@ je wobhladowak z funkcijemi priwatnosće ze škitom před slědowanjom a blokowanjom wobsaha.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of incognito section from onboarding screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title of incognito section from onboarding screen.
Used as a text for the link in Onboarding.PrivacyNotice.Text.

trans-unit.source: Firefox cares about your privacy. Read more in %@.
trans-unit.target: Firefox so wo wašu priwatnosć stara. Dalše informacije w %@.
trans-unit.note: Text that describes Firefox's commitment to privacy. %@ is a link using Onboarding.PrivacyNotice.LinkText as text.

trans-unit.source: Configure settings so you can decide how much or how little you share.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurujće nastajenja, zo byšće móhł rozsudźić, kelko abo kak mało přeradźeće.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of protection section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of protection section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Take your private browsing to the next level.
trans-unit.target: Zběhńće swój priwatny modus na přichodnu runinu.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the subtitle for onboarding screen.
Label for the agreement button in the Terms of Use screen.
Button label to dismiss the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use screen.
Used as a text for the link in Onboarding.TermsOfUse.Text.
Subtitle for the Terms of Use screen during onboarding.
Text that describes the agreement to the Firefox Terms of Use. %@ is a link using Onboarding.TermsOfUse.LinkText as text.
Title for the Terms of Use screen during onboarding. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the title for onboarding screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Tap Safari, then select Content Blockers
trans-unit.target: Podótkńće so Safari a wubjerće potom wobsahowe blokowaki
trans-unit.note: Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Label for instructions to enable extensions in Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Error label when the blocker is not enabled, shown in the intro and main app when disabled. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable extensions in Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Save button label

trans-unit.source: That didn’t work. Try replacing the search term with this: %s.
trans-unit.target: To njeje fungowało. Spytajće pytanski wuraz přez tutón wuměnić: %s.
trans-unit.note: Label for error state when entering an invalid search engine URL. %s is a search term in a URL.
Label for disable option on search suggestions prompt
Label for enable option on search suggestions prompt

trans-unit.source: To get suggestions, %@ needs to send what you type in the address bar to the search engine.
trans-unit.target: Zo byšće namjety dóstał, dyrbi %@ wobsah, kotryž sće do adresoweho pola zapodał, na pytawu słać.
trans-unit.note: %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”). Label for search suggestions prompt message
Title for search suggestions prompt

trans-unit.source: This helps Mozilla to estimate active users.
trans-unit.target: To Mozilla pomha, sej aktiwnych wužiwarjow wažić.
trans-unit.note: On the Settings screen, this is the subtitle text for a toggle which controls sending daily usage ping.
On the Settings screen, this is the title text for a toggle which controls automatically sending daily usage ping.

trans-unit.target: Pytanski wuraz, kotryž ma so wužiwać
trans-unit.note: Label for input of search engine template

trans-unit.source: Paste or enter search string. If necessary, replace search term with: %s.
trans-unit.target: Pytanski wuraz zasadźić abo zapodać. Jeli trjeba, wuměńće pytanski wuraz přez: %s.
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text for input of new search engine template
Title for the URL Autocomplete row

trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and web pages.

trans-unit.source: This helps us diagnose and fix issues with the browser.
trans-unit.target: To nam zmóžnja, problemy z wobhladowakom diagnosticěrować a rozrisać.
trans-unit.note: Description associated with the Crash Reports toggle on settings screen

trans-unit.source: %@ will send what you type in the address bar to your search engine.
trans-unit.target: %@ so na wašu pytawu pósćele, štož w adresowym polu zapodaće.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Search Suggestions toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %@ for everyone.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla so prócuje, jenož informacije hromadźić, kotrež trjebamy, zo bychmy %@ za kóždeho poskićili a polěpšili.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Send Usage Data toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: %@ may install and run studies from time to time.

trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Studies toggle on the settings screen. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

Text for a label that indicates the description for request desktop tip.

trans-unit.source: Want to see the full desktop version of a site?
trans-unit.target: Chceće sej dospołnu desktopowu wersiju sydła wobhladać?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for request desktop tip.

Text for a label that indicates the description for share trackers tip. %@ is the number of trackers blocked. Only shown when there are more than 10 trackers blocked. For locales where we would need plural support, please feel free to translate this string as `Trackers blocked so far: %@` instead.
Text for a label that indicates the title for share trackers tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Select Add to Shortcuts from the %@ menu
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description for shortcuts tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Create shortcuts to the sites you visit most:
trans-unit.target: Wutworće zwjazanja ze sydłami, kotrež najhusćišo wopytujeće:
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for shortcuts tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri erase tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri erase tip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri favorite tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri favorite tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.source: Site missing content or acting strange?
trans-unit.target: Sydło so dźiwnje zadźeržuje abo wobsah faluje?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for sites not working tip.
Text shown on quick action widget inviting the user to browse in the app. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Go to Settings to manage specific privacy & security options.
trans-unit.target: Wočińće nastajenja, zo byšće wěste nastajenja priwatnosće a wěstoty rjadował.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: Tute standardne nastajenja mócny škit poskićeja. Ale je lochko, nastajenja wašim specifiskim potrjebam přměrić.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: Start your private browsing session, and we’ll block trackers and other bad stuff as you go.
trans-unit.target: Započńće swoje priwatne přehladowanske posedźenje a my budźemy přesćěhowaki a druhe škódne elementy při tutej składnosći blokować.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Search Bar tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: %@ je sydłu zadźěwał was wuskušować. Podótkńće so tarče, zo byšće informacije wo tym dóstał, štož smy zablokowali.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).

trans-unit.source: Got ‘em! We stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield any time to see what we’re blocking.
trans-unit.target: Lepjene! Smy sydło při tym haćili was wuskušować. Podótkńće so kóždy čas tarča, zo byšće widźał, štož my blokujemy.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip when we block trackers for the first time on a website

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
trans-unit.target: Podótkńće so kóždy čas papjernika, zo byšće wšě slědy swojeho posedźenja wotstronił.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: Tap here to trash it all — history, cookies, everything — and start fresh on a new tab.
trans-unit.target: Podótkńće so tu, zo byšće wšitko do papjernika přesunył – historiju, placki, wšitko – a startujće znowa na nowym rajtarku.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip
This is the title text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip
Label displayed for button used as a shortcut to add a link to the list of URLs to autocomplete.
Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Erase button in the URL bar
Message shown after pressing the Erase button
Label displayed for find in page button when typing in the URL Bar. %@ is any text the user has typed into the URL bar that they want to find on the current page.
Text for a menu displayed from the bottom of the screen when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Placeholder text shown in the URL bar before the user navigates to a page
Label displayed for search button when typing in the URL bar. %@ is the text type by the user.
Text for the URL bar showing the number of trackers blocked on a webpage.
Title for the action button shown on card view that will take the user to a tutorial explaining the user how to add an widget

trans-unit.source: We’ll leave you to your private browsing, but get a quicker start next time with the %@ widget on your Home screen.
trans-unit.target: Přewostajamy wašemu priwatnemu modusej, ale startujće přichodny raz spěšnišo z asistentom %@ na swojej startowej wobrazowce.
trans-unit.note: Subtitle shown on card view explaining the app has a widget option. %@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”).
Title shown on card view explaining the app has a widget option
Title for action sheet item to open the current page in another application. %@ is the name of the application to open the current page.
Toast displayed after a URL has been copied to the clipboard
Label to display in the Discoverability overlay for keyboard shortcuts
Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. %1$@ is the app name (for example “Firefox Focus” or ”Firefox Klar”), %2$@ is the app it wants to open.

trans-unit.source: Add a %@ shortcut to your Home screen. After adding the widget, touch and hold to edit it and select a different shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Přidajće startowej wobrazowce zwjazanje %@. Po tym zo sće asistent přidał, podótkńće so asistenta a dźeržće jón, zo byšće wobdźěłował a wubjerće druhe zwjazanje.
trans-unit.note: Description for small size widget to add it to home screen. %@ is the name of the app(Focus/Klar).

trans-unit.source: Start a private search in %@ with your default search engine.
trans-unit.target: Započńće priwatne pytanje w %@ ze swojej standardnej pytawu.
